columns.id: The unique identifier for each stadium.
columns.name: The name of the stadium.
columns.Home_Games: The number of home games played at the stadium.
columns.Average_Attendance: The average number of attendees per game.
columns.Total_Attendance: The total number of attendees for all games.
columns.Capacity_Percentage: The percentage of stadium capacity filled during games.

stadium.table_description: The table provides information about stadiums and their attendance metrics.

columns.stadium_id: The unique identifier for the stadium hosting the game.
columns.id: The unique identifier for each game.
columns.Season: The year in which the game is played.
columns.Date: The date when the game occurs.
columns.Home_team: The name of the home team in the game.
columns.Away_team: The name of the away team in the game.
columns.Score: The final score of the game, for both teams.
columns.Competition: The tournament or league in which the game is played.

game.table_description: The table captures details of games including teams, scores, and seasons.

columns.game_id: The unique identifier for the game related to the injury.
columns.id: The unique identifier for each injury record.
columns.Player: The name of the player who sustained the injury.
columns.Injury: The description of the injury incurred by the player.
columns.Number_of_matches: The number of matches the player missed due to the injury.
columns.Source: The source of information regarding the injury.

injury_accident.table_description: The table tracks injuries of players related to specific games.
